id.description: A unique ID for the activity.

link.description: A self referencing link to the activity.

targetResource.description: A reference to the resource affected by the activity.

relatedResources.description: An array of references to resources also related to this activity.

action.description: The action being performed in the activity (e.g. CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED, ARCHIVED, etc.).

actionTime.description: The date and time the action took place.

responsibleParty.description: A reference to the party that performed the action on the resource. This could be the username of the User who performed the action. This could also be a reference to the party (e.g. Organization) that accessed the API endpoint to perform the action on the resource.

message.description: An activity message which may be used to supply addition information regarding the activity.
